name: Shoot With Santa
description:
Santa asks for your help to destroy all the rockets that, for some reason, are shot at him. Help him save Christmas!


Use arrow keys or WASD to move your character.

Press SPACE or click with your mouse anywhere on the screen to shoot.

Every 10 seconds, you must shoot at least one rocket.

Green ones give you 5 score points and +10 seconds on the timer more than a normal rocket.

If the timer reaches 0, you'll lose.

Have fun!
